bug.author: amygdala
bug.summary: add kfmd to the notebook image(s)
bug.description: /kind bug It looks like kf v061 does not bundle the kfmd lib -- it should be added. (Probably this is on someone's radar already, but filing just in case not). <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/115093/62722869-31199700-b9c4-11e9-98fa-78b0dbb925fd.png></denchmark-link>
